metadata.title: ONCA IT | Enterprise Mobile Solutions
metadata.description: Optimize your company's operations with Onca Mobile. Order management, deliveries, collections and more from any Android device.

services.title: SERVICES
services.description: Onca Mobile is a mobile solution designed to digitize and optimize your company's daily operations. Integrated with your central system or ERP, or standalone, it allows you to record transactions and key activities right when they happen, from any Android device.

visits.title: Customer Visits, Quotes and Mobile Orders
visits.subtitle: Boost your sales force with an agile and efficient solution.
visits.description: This module allows your sales team to manage quotes, record orders and declare customer visits directly from your mobile device, anytime, anywhere.
visits.highlight: Increase your sales with greater customer proximity and a more efficient sales force. Speed up orders, reduce costs and improve satisfaction with fast, error-free deliveries. Record quotes, visits and orders in real time, with geolocation, smart scheduling, flexible commercial controls and instant access to stock, prices and conditions. Personalized attention with key information at your fingertips.
benefits: Instant access to stock and prices

orders.title: Customer Portal â€¢ Web Order Entry
orders.subtitle: Serve your B2B customers quickly, directly and without intermediaries.
orders.description: Our web portal is designed for your customers to manage their orders with complete independence, comfort and in real time. Connected online to your ERP system, it allows them to access all the information they need to purchase efficiently and securely.
orders.highlight: Offer your customers total autonomy to manage orders and consult information 24/7. Access updated prices, real-time stock and financial data such as balances and invoices. 100% web app, accessible from any device, integrated online with your ERP. No data duplication or delays. Ideal for companies with wholesale clients, distributors or corporate customers.

preparation.title: Preparation, control, packaging and mobile dispatch
preparation.subtitle: Streamline your Logistics Operations with Precision and Efficiency.
preparation.description: Our Preparation and Dispatch module transforms your inventory management into an agile and error-free process. From Android mobile devices, you can manage everything from picking to shipping, eliminating the use of paper and manual processes.
preparation.highlight: Speed up order preparation and dispatch with greater precision, fewer errors and better use of time and resources. Route optimization with smart maps, total paperless digitization, and real-time traceability. Compatible with Android tablets and data collectors, includes barcode scanning and integrates with your ERP. Ideal for shipments to customers or between warehouses, improving deliveries and customer loyalty.

delivery.title: Deliveries
delivery.subtitle: Optimization and Efficiency in your Deliveries.
delivery.description: Designed to improve the delivery process from start to finish, our Deliveries module ensures that every order reaches its destination with maximum efficiency. Experience improved workflow, fewer errors and greater customer satisfaction.
delivery.highlight: Improve delivery efficiency by optimizing routes and times. Provide real-time information to customers and teams, with automatic notifications about delivery status. Reduce errors and complaints with more precise and organized processes. Use optimal routes, integration with routing apps and digital documentation with photos of signed receipts. With Deliveries, transform your logistics and elevate customer satisfaction.

reception.title: Mobile Goods Reception
reception.subtitle: Optimization and Control in the Reception of Your Products.
reception.description: Our Goods Reception module is designed to streamline and optimize the reception process, ensuring that every delivery from your suppliers or own warehouses is managed calmly and precisely.
reception.highlight: Improve goods reception with agile and precise processes. Avoid unauthorized entries, minimize errors and automate supplier claims. Use barcodes and QR codes for exact control, automatic product identification and validation against orders. Implement blind control for greater precision. With this module, make your reception more efficient, secure and aligned with your actual orders.

collections.title: Mobile Collections
collections.subtitle: Efficient and Digitized Collection Management.
collections.description: The Mobile Collections module revolutionizes payment management, allowing immediate impact and efficient handling of collections made by field teams. Say goodbye to paper and welcome a completely digital solution.
collections.highlight: Real-time collections, paperless with always updated current account. Record payments with precision, instantly release credit and improve customer experience. Avoid errors, duplications and improve cash management. Capture multiple payment methods and apply receipts with clarity. With Mobile Collections, digitize your process and make it more agile, secure and efficient for your team and your customers.

authorization.title: Authorization
authorization.subtitle: Optimization of order analysis and approval.
authorization.description: The Authorization module optimizes the analysis and approval of purchase orders, orders and requirements, enabling immediate decisions and greater operational control. Simplify internal processes and ensure traceability at every stage, all from a 100% digital environment.
authorization.highlight: Automation of rules and approval circuits optimizes internal processes and improves coordination between areas. Eliminates manual processes, standardizes criteria and brings efficiency and transparency to daily operations.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

collection.content: We collect information you provide directly, such as name, email, phone and company when you complete our contact form or request a demo.

use.title: Use of Information
use.content: We use your information to respond to your inquiries, send you information about our services and improve our solutions.

protection.title: Data Protection

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct or delete your personal information. Contact us at any time to exercise these rights.
